song_lyrics: Ka’un chhu ka’u chhu ka’u chhu re, hāth joḍīne tamne ka’u chhu re;
Rājī re’sho mārā upar, guṇ tamārā gau chhu re... °ṭek
Mahimā tamāro mīṭho sāgar rātdivas temā na’u chhu re;
Rūp tamāru rudiye rākhī rājī rājī hu to thau chhu re... Ka’u chhu° 1
Antar chokhu karvā sāru araj tamne dau chhu re;
Guṇ tamārā gāvvā sāru haroj hājar ra’u chhu re... Ka’u chhu° 2
Vachan tamāru shir chaḍāvī jyā mūko tyā jau chhu re;
Mahāpuruṣh kahe Mahāpuruṣh chho sāchā sogan khau chhu re... Ka’u chhu° 3
title: Ka’u chhu ka’u chhu ka’u chhu re hāth joḍīne tamne ka’u chhu re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-107: Sadhu Mahapurushdas

Category: Shastriji Maharajna Pad
